sentences.sContent: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.sCn: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.sContent: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.sCn: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.sContent: the environmental impact of pollution from cars
sentences.sCn: 汽车造成的污染对环境的影响

sentences.sContent: ...maintain that environmental progress needs to go hand-in-hand with economic development...
...It is difficult to find solid evidence to prove environmental friendliness generates more profits than exploiting the natural environment...
...and then use the wealth created to tackle environmental degradation...
...A handful of lawsuits have been filed in recent years against companies accused of using misleading environmental labels...
...richer societies are able to provide environmental improvements which lie well beyond the reach of poorer communities...
...Martin Sommerkorn runs the Arctic program for the environmental charity the World Wildlife Fund...
...some indicator which would rate the wealth of nations in both economic and environmental terms and show a relationship between the two...
...The common theme of the UN reports is the relation between environmental protection and economic growth...
...environmental problems are generally related to industrialization and technological development...
...The idea is that we are taking more out of what you might call the planet's environmental bank balance than it can sustain; we are living beyond our ecological means...

trans.tranOther: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth
